      • canContinue

        public boolean canContinue()
        Description copied from interface: QueueDriver
        Logic to tell the queue when to stop running Queues will always stop when there is no more work to do. This method can return false to cause the queue to stop early.
        Specified by:
        canContinue in interface QueueDriver
        Returns:
        Returns boolean canContinue
